summary: An expose of the lives and loves of Madison Avenue working girls and their higher ups.
cast: Hope Lange|Stephen Boyd|Suzy Parker|Martha Hyer|Diane Baker|Brian Aherne|Robert Evans|Brett Halsey|Donald Harron|Sue Carson|Linda Hutchings|Lionel Kane|Ted Otis|Louis Jourdan|Joan Crawford|Gertrude Astor|Alan Austin|Joseph Bardo|June Blair|Paul Bradley|Wally Brown|Steve Carruthers|Harry Carter|John Corrydon|Patricia Crest|Roxann Delman|Jesslyn Fax|Steven Gant|Helen Gerald|Gwenllian Gill|Molly Glessing|Robert Haines|Myrna Hansen|Mike Mahoney|Byron Morrow|Voltaire Perkins|Leoda Richards|John Rockwell|James Stone|Paul von Schreiber
title: Mujeres frente al amor
